attributes.action: petition for the Government to provide funds to rebuild RNOH to a modern standard as befite a hospital of this world renowned status
attributes.additional_details: The Royal National Orthopaedic Hospital is a world famous hospital for its expertise but it is a disgrace to the National Health service for its dilapidated condition and should be re-built from the ground up. The Department of Health should pay for the re-build.

rejection.details: Neither the Government nor the Department of Health is responsible for funding individual hospitals, which are funded by the local NHS and NHS England according to the services that they provide.
